title: Egg free chocolate chip banana cake
ingredients: ['3 very ripe bananas', '110g (4 oz) sugar', '50g (2 oz) melted margarine or butter', '170g (6 oz) self raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '110g (4 oz) plain chocolate chips', 'Icing', '110g (4 oz) icing sugar', '40g (1 1/2 oz) buttery spread', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder']
